name: Elenore Uy
text: Wishing you the courage to do so, Roy. If it's any consolation, the feeling of relief that comes after such conversations make them worth it.

source_obj.text: Wishing you the courage to do so, Roy. If it's any consolation, the feeling of relief that comes after such conversations make them worth it.

replies.text: Except for when unresolvable issues are involved and lingering resentment lasts for months or years?
Well, at least you know that you'll need to avoid that person for an eternity. 😬
